title: ONE & ONLY: PETE DEVRIES
description: If your daily surf commute leans more towards Nat Geo than PCH, you're probably Pete Devries. Get amongst the wilderness (and super fun waves) in this coldwater One & Only. See more at http://hurley.com/peterdevries. Filmed and edited by Adam Chilton.

asset.author: Hurley
